problem.title: Problem Definition Framework
problem.user_content: Small farmers like Ablawa, a 42-year-old corn producer in rural Togo managing 3 hectares and supporting 5 children
problem.need_content: an accessible early warning and pest detection system to identify threats like fall armyworm before they cause massive crop losses
problem.insight_content: they lack technological accessibility, systematic monitoring protocols, and trained personnel for crop health surveillance, leaving them vulnerable to unexpected pest outbreaks that can destroy 33% of their harvest and threaten their family's food security and income
